edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class AdminApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.WISEApplication
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.AdminApplication

  • public class AdminApplication
extends WISEApplication
    This class represents the Admin information when running the Admin application. Instance represent administrator user session.
